abstract: Photographs of New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio during his first year in office.
lead_paragraph: When he was sworn in as New York City’s mayor, Mr. de Blasio was also inaugurated into a newfound celebrity, someone whose every move is scrutinized, evaluated and also photographed.
snippet: When he was sworn in as New York City’s mayor, Mr. de Blasio was also inaugurated into a newfound celebrity, someone whose every move is scrutinized, evaluated and also photographed.

headline.main: Photographs of Mayor Bill de Blasio, Year One
